definition: Yue state/generic term for states in south China or southeast Asia at different historical periods
generic word for peoples or states of south China or south Asia at different historical periods/abbr. for Vietnam 越南
to exceed/to climb over/to surpass/the more... the more
country/nation/state/national/CL:個|个[ge4]
surname Guo

sentences.english: It is a cross-border international river.
sentences.chinese: 是一條跨越國界的河流。

sentences.english: During the Spring and Autumn Period(770-476BC), there were two famous senior officials in the State of Yue.
sentences.chinese: 范蠡和文仲是春秋時期越國的兩個大官。

sentences.english: Spring and Autumn period, Longwan become more jurisdiction in the country.
sentences.chinese: 春秋戰國時期，龍灣成爲越國轄地。

sentences.english: In other words, this palace is the palace of South Vietnam in accordance with the construction of the Han.
sentences.chinese: 也就是說，這座宮殿是南越國按照漢皇宮建造地。

sentences.english: He wants to move to the country.
Nanyue Kingdom was an important regional regime in Lingnan in late Qin and early Han Dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 南越國是秦末漢初存在於嶺南地區的重要地方政權。

sentences.english: Their army is poorly trained, unable to withstand a single blow.
sentences.chinese: 越國的軍隊也缺乏訓練，不堪一擊。

sentences.english: One day after consultations they decided to go to the state of Yue to earn a livelihood.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，他們商量想到越國去謀生。

sentences.english: He added, "We now have a transnational media."
sentences.chinese: 他補充說，“我們現在有一個跨越國界的媒體。

sentences.english: Three years later, Gou Jian was set free and returned to the State of Yue.
sentences.chinese: 三年以後，勾踐終於被釋放回了越國。

sentences.english: The Kingdom of Yue surrendered as it was losing the war with the Kingdom of Wu.
sentences.chinese: 越國在和吳國的戰爭中失敗了，向吳國投降。

sentences.english: By its nature, humor crosses conventional boundaries and breaks patterns. Creativity often does the same.
sentences.chinese: 就其性質而言，幽默常規跨越國界和休息模式。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, as Fuchai’s kingdom declined, Yue grew rich and raised a new army.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，當夫差的王國每況愈下，越國則富國強兵。

sentences.english: Many years later, he was set free.
sentences.chinese: 幾年以後，勾踐被放回越國。

sentences.english: Several years later, he was set free.
sentences.chinese: 幾年以後，勾踐被放回越國。

Yangxin county in Huangshi 黃石|黄石[Huang2 shi2], Hubei
mulberry farming/to grow mulberry for sericulture
